name: Cottage Cheese Croquettes
author: MARLAD97124
summary: Vegetarian croquettes made with cottage cheese, onion, bread crumbs, nuts, and seasoning. Covered with mushroom gravy.
ingredients: 1 slice soft bread, torn into small pieces
½ cup mushroom gravy, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion until softened, 5 to 10 minutes

Mix sauteed onion, bread crumbs, cottage cheese, torn bread, pecans, nutritional yeast, wheat germ, poultry seasoning, soy sauce, sage, and thyme together in a bowl; form into croquettes and place on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Pour gravy over croquettes and continue baking until cooked through, about 30 minutes more
